modShortDescription: This mod allows you to disassemble ammunition you find in the game. Compatible with Alpha 19, needs to have new ammo added.
modDescription:
This mod allows you to disassemble ammunition you find in the game. If the [ammo](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) normally requires a workbench to build, you need one to disassemble it, though you do not learn the recipe to disassemble it. Compatible with Alpha 19, needs to have new ammo added.

**[Download](http://cdgroup.org/files/7dtd/AmmoDisassembly.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8777-lucs-modlet-collection-quality-bonuses-better-stamina-terrain-mv-spd-etc/).

**Credits:** [Luc](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/luc/)
